website_summaries.verdict: Puts the pedal to the metal in terms of a powerful lawn clean-up.
pros: With a 230 mph power stream, this leaf blower is capable of clearing away leaves and sticks as well as cleaning gutters
A powerful machine for the price point
cons: Bag is not as airtight as we expected

customer_reviews.title: I got this machine and it was not easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I got this machine and it was not easy to setup. Once I did I discovered the bag is way too porous and made a huge mess on myself with the cloud of dust it left. The vacum part does not suck very well. It is difficult to carry around and I am a 5 ft 4" woman. Not sure I am going to keep this at this point.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, not the best vaccum but great at mulching
customer_reviews.text: Assembly pinched my forearm as I was trying to connect,becareful. Very heavy to carry around, I am 56 and 180 lbs not the fittest but it gets very tiring after a while. Blower is good but heavy,mainly uses it for bodha tree leaves, the mulched did a fantastic job of eating up very large thick dry leaves but I had to feed it in by hand suction is not very good but mulched a mountain of leaves and chopped it down by a factor of 20 or higher which was excellent. Bag is very poor, needs a better design so it doesn't spray very fine dust, dust mask is a must.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Built to fail
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the leaf vac feature after reading the good reviews. After using just two times the zipper on the leaf bag failed and had to splice it back together, after a total of just five uses the bag is coming apart. Seriously? You may have well just offered a leaf vac for rent instead of selling something that breaks after a few times. And no, was not vacuuming up rocks or shards of glass, just normal leaves. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Billy H

customer_reviews.title: Not what the advertisment says
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought it to suck leaves and small twigs but & that's a big but....! 1. blowing power is weak compared to my old black & decker that I gave it up for that one! 2. Weak suction unless you're working with grass clippings. 3. Weak zipper got stuck at first use that I still have clippings in the bag! 4. Even with 6 speeds, barely the 6th speed would blow clippings, I'm going back to my black & decker.....what a waste of money. 5. Matter of fact I doubt the advertised blowing speed. 6. My advise is to try the item on display before you dip into your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Samir B.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this blower/mulcher through Amazon based on ok enough reviews and price, but I guess you get what you pay for. Blower failed to turn on when I received this. Now I have to spend additional money buying a large box to mail back for my refund. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Sum

customer_reviews.title: Brook after less than one year
customer_reviews.text: I like this product alot although it was a little difficult to assemble it at first, a little heavy, and a little cumbersome to operate. It worked very well saving me time and the need to get down on my hands and knees to pick up debris. Unfortunately 11 months after purchasing it it broke. One minute it was working fine and the next..."nothing." I checked my electrical source, changed extension chords and still nothing. I will be contacting the manufacturer tomorrow (today is Sunday) for repair/replacement in that this product claims it is warrantied for 4 year from date of purchase. Let's hope so.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor bag design.
customer_reviews.text: If you want this for only the blower feature it might work for you, if you want to use it as a vacuum / mulcher it wont. The bag design allows dust to escape from the top half of the bag, so you end up with a fine layer of dust covering you or the patio you are trying to clean.
customer_reviews.author: donna s

customer_reviews.title: Such junk, thrown away resorting to old fashion rake and bag. (Frowny face)
customer_reviews.text: Depending on how mulched you really want the leaves to be. A better mulcher is not this. This barely sucks wet leaves . The mulching bag is small. Leave blowing is a joke. Assembly is easy if your a rocket engineer. Good Luck didn’t come with directions booklet.
customer_reviews.author: daryl

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year of occasional use
customer_reviews.text: It just stopped working the other day, while I was in the middle of blowing leaves. I've had it almost exactly a year, and it's supposed to have a 4-year warranty. So far my attempts to contact the company have gone unanswered. So, unless you want a product that will be trash in a year--from a company that doesn't seem to care--you probably should buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Petrizzo

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for tiny debris/evergreen leaves etc.
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy oh boy, so this is not the product for trees or debris that is tiny or not complete. If you suck it up, it goes through the bag and out into your face, clothes, and makes a complete dust. My trees in the backyard are mostly those that do not have complete leaves (needle like), so you can imagine the surprise I had when I looked at my clothes and my face. So much dust! This is only meant for regular leaves and not for small debris including dirt, otherwise, it will go through the bag and pretty much waste time and not be useful at all. Wish I can return this, but forgot the return window.
customer_reviews.author: B. K

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this blower. Works just like instructions said it would. I used it the day it arrived and am extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: Stops working because the door switch quit working.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum/blowers works great.....when it works. After about 6 uses it quit working completely. I can work my way around with tools and found that the switch on the bottom for the door/screen closure was not working. The fix? Order a new switch right? Wrong. Couldn’t locate one on the web. It comes only with a complete new Motor. Open the machine up. Cut and splice the 2 wires together thus bypassing it. May be a minor safety issue if you are wreckless and run the machine with the door/screen open but who does that right?
customer_reviews.author: Alan King

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device to vacuum leaves in my backyard. While it seems fine overall, the waste bag is just a disaster. The minute I turned this machine on, I was covered in the cloud of dust from head to toe! At first, I though that I might have forgotten to zip up the waste bag but then I realized that the top part of it is made from a different material than the bottom. It’s more like a net and everything just flies through it. It was just an awful experience. I’m definitely returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Katya Nuce

customer_reviews.title: Greenworks 24072 blower/mulcher is junk
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected a piece of junk bought 2/21/20 and 5/4/20 dead. Tried to call 800 support no., no longer in service although it is still listed on their website. Don't waste your money. I gave it one star, that's lowest evaluation possible.
customer_reviews.author: Kb64

customer_reviews.title: It is powerful
customer_reviews.text: Use it to blow off patio & to blow out our flowerbeds. It’s a little heavier than I would like it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Lana De Mond

customer_reviews.title: Drying Power?
customer_reviews.text: Why would a leaf blower/mulcher get a request for a drying power rating? That aside, we love this leaf blower the way we love our clothes dryer: Very efficient. It will allow us to mulch leaves that we have had for a while. It also clears areas very well. Love it. And, if you want to use it to dry things, I think it will work for that, too.
customer_reviews.author: The Gent

customer_reviews.title: No more nasty fumes, or clogged carbs. Let's go green!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the attached leaf blower. It is very easy to start up, and it effectively blows leaves leaves and grass trimmings around for easy clean up. The blower has variable speeds, so it can adjust accordingly for the job at hand. No more nasty fumes or clogged carbs, this blower works very well. One thing to note, make sure you use the appropriate extension cord which can handle the amps.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo H

customer_reviews.title: Backyard was blown into a pile quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love using the leaf blower. My young son had been raking leaves and getting nowhere when my older son went out and blew all the leaves to the back very quickly and the leaves only get done once a year so they had accumulated. I wish I had thought to take a picture or video.
customer_reviews.author: tej2817

customer_reviews.title: Excellent power.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works very well, I just wish I had someone to do the work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out how to connect the largest component on the device I was happy! Suction is incredible, couple times I had to clear some leaves but amazing job. I would imagine dry leaves suck up much better. But none thee less job gets done. Can’t wait to see how it does with snow blowing....
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Gray El

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not working
customer_reviews.text: Got this product as a Christmas present and it has worked great for almost a year. Just when I need it the most the thing stopped working! Maybe faulty switch, idk. Has great power, a little heavy but get used to it. The mulched is amazing. Just wish I could get it to work again.
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! This is exactly what I needed to pick up little dead leaves and plant debris that piled up in my small rock beds over the winter months. It reminds me of cleaning a fish tank, using the large clear tube to filter the gravel. It leaves the gravel but sucks up the other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: A. Frost

customer_reviews.title: best corded blower out there
customer_reviews.text: Seems everyone wants the cordless nowadays, not me. For me it's all about the velocity due to the number of large trees in my yard and for the price and quality of this blower, I purchased this as a replacement for the one that I have owned for the past 8 years if ever needed or if corded models become unavailable.
customer_reviews.author: chkb

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you only need it to work for a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: I needed this product for sucking up leaves. I was skeptical at first but figured I would send it back if it didn't work. Well, I was pleasantly surprised at the first use. It worked great, did exactly what I bought it for. I used it every few weeks and on the sixth or seventh use it just completely died on me. It would not even turn on at all. Needless to say, I don't recommend this product. I certainly won't be buying from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: Leaf Blower and Vacuum in One
customer_reviews.text: What a great invention!! This is super easy to set-up and use. I am a grandmother and I followed the easy directions to set it up and was outside vacuuming up leaves in no time. It will pick up and mulch leaves and small sticks, even an occasional acorn that gets in the way. The only reason I did not give this product 5 stars is because the zipper on the bag is very flimsy. I even talked to the Manufacturer and they are working on a new design. If the bag had a heavy duty zipper, I would easily give this product 6 STARS!!!! Change nozzles and you have an excellent blower to use. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anne C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Blower--the vacuum sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I like this blower--it is pretty strong. 2-speeds is perfect. I use primarily on my deck and driveway during the summer. Haven't tried on the lawn since there is no need yet. The vacuum is worthless simple because it pulverizes the leaves creating dust that goes through the bag and all over the user and surrounding area. I'd say you'd need to be wearing coveralls and a cap and possibly a mask. I was hoping this feature would work well because the pulverized leaves make great composting material, but it is simply too dirty an operation. I bought it primarily for blowing and for the money, it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Dioji

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy, way too loud
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy.. Way too loud Will return the leaf blower and invest in a ryobi cordless one. The hassle of dang around wire is probably not worth it when for few bucks more u get a wireless one.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowFaxRider

customer_reviews.title: I do not recomend this product
customer_reviews.text: The power is grate but I do not lick the bag suction, 1st Is hard to lock the bag, 2nd at the end of the job you are wearing the dust 3rd the bag is large, not practical
customer_reviews.author: George Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product. It is a little heavier than I’d like and it does blow a ton of dust up when you use the vacuum, but the bag does need to breathe so the motor doesn’t over heat, so that is understandable. Doesn’t pick up small twigs in my rocks which I was hoping to use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Great for an electric
customer_reviews.text: The design for this is great because it used a smaller flattened tip that actually focuses the air. Large circular blowers don't work well. I have not used it as a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I read all the one star reviews and decided to try it anyway do to the price. sadly they are all true. -The bag does not filter well and you will end up covered in dust. - the impeller/Mulcher is made of plastic and grinds and crunches as it sucks stuff up. - feels low quality and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimee Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: Works for me - turned neighbors green with envy...GreenWorks
customer_reviews.text: In the fall I have leaves in a lower area all across the back yard. I can now blow these leaves into the woods behind the low area with ease. Same thing with all the leaves inside the fence. The driveway...blows with ease. What is funny is I only had the blower number on 3 or 4 and thought hmmm..well gee..this is no better than my old blower. Welll...when I realized my mistake and took it up a few notches..voila! Needless to say, I am a happy puppy..thank you GreenWorks..my second GW product I am pleased with..other is a battery operated trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: jackolyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small yards
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little blower/vac for the money. Fairly light weight. I have a very small yard, but lots of leaves, and the Greenworks is just what I needed. My only complaint is that the vacuum attachment is awkward for me to get seated properly. Might just be b/c I'm a senior female with short arms, but that's also why I bought this smaller, lightweight blower/vacuum. For blowing the leaves into piles and clearing off the yard and patio, it's easy to handle and does a great job. Perhaps with practice, I'll be able to get that vacuum tube on without so much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Southern GalTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: geenworks illconcieved product
customer_reviews.text: i have been very happy with my Amazon purchases in the past but the greenworks 24072 blower mulcher is a waste of money! Save your dollars and get a blower because the mulcher is (my opinion only) ineffective and takes 3 time's longer than a 10.00 rake to get leaves up!! and be prepared to get dirty when using the mucher because dirt comes thru the zipper part of the mulch bag and wind's up all over you! the blower is ok at best but investing in a rake will save you lot's of money and time! the picture of the 24072 blower vac by greeworks look's really great but remember you can't judge a book by it's cover!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Kasow

customer_reviews.title: Works well, combines vacuum and blower
customer_reviews.text: Very prompt delivery to our place in Mexico, never before has anything been delivered in four days, a day earlier than promised! Our Garden Vac was bought to clean a garden in a home for disabled seniors so for the lady cleaner we needed something she could use. The disposal bag and zip make collecting and emptying a dream. It took just a while to put it all together but the instruction book was easy to read, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Dead in less than one year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the Greenworks mower less than one year ago (summer 2018). I took them out of the garage this year and hooked them up, they are already dead. Stay away from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: S. Rajagopalan

customer_reviews.title: Leaf vacuum
customer_reviews.text: i have only used it one time, did a very good job at vacuum up the leaves, however, i found it to be a little heavy, but i do like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely Awesome! It has so much power!
customer_reviews.text: First off, you just can't beat the price! This tool is just amazing; It has a great power to it. I had no problem getting leaves out of my flower bed and around my yard. The Mulcher works great as well. I would recommend wearing a mask, since you can't help but getting some dust and a few parts flying around. I love the GreenWorks line! I also have the trimmer and hope to get more sometime soon. Nothing beats the ease of just plugging it in and going, and you can't help feeling a little good while you use them. This Blower/Van is extremely easy to use and very light. =)
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Bell

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sensitive - had to repeatedly replug the attachments times to get it to work from the moment pulling it out of a new box. Completely died after 12 uses. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: ggchandler

customer_reviews.title: Very good blower
customer_reviews.text: I do love this blower, I have not tried the vacuum part, but the two speed is nice. Only thing I wish were different was that it had a longer barrel, it's short so if you want the tip close to the ground you will need to bend over.
customer_reviews.author: David - Texas

customer_reviews.title: This thing SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a new house, with a big cottonwood tree out front, how FUN in the fall. We had lots of leaves to pickup so when I saw this product I didnt think twice. It came very well packaged and it was easy to put together. On the Vacuum side, DONT make a pile a leaves, it would be able to take it, suck them up as they lay, the drier the better. As a blower it works great as well, has a "focused" tip that you can remove to make the pattern wide. This has been great for cleaning out the garage and driveway. Great product with a METAL impeller, at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great blower.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly tried mulched thing once. No luck. Now the blower was great. Kicked up a storm had to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Erik T

customer_reviews.title: Good mulcher
customer_reviews.text: Good mulcher, has nice suction and manages small twigs with ease. The bag is vented on top so be aware of the dust that comes out with dry leaves. Reccomend wearing dust mask and ear plugs when using it.
customer_reviews.author: JoeM

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about a minute!! Packed it back up and shipped it back. Don't waste your time with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Made quick work of all the leaves in my yard and it was super easy to empty the bag in to the compost bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great warranty service; too bad it's necessary so often.
customer_reviews.text: This machine has failed twice since purchase -- after moderate use. That is definitely a downer. On the plus side, the company has fairly quickly sent a brand new replacement after each breakdown, which impresses me mightily. I've had to take it each time to a shop that does warranty service for GreenWorks, and I guess that I'm lucky to have one only twenty minutes away. It seems to be the vacuum function that does it in, not blowing.
customer_reviews.author: threej

customer_reviews.title: ... opened the box the blower and the attachments were dirty like they’d been used and returned and the instruction ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet but when I opened the box the blower and the attachments were dirty like they’d been used and returned and the instruction Manuel was dirty and greasy. I plugged it in to make sure it works and it does. I’ll update once I use it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: This sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Rake em up, suck em up, bag em up. Don't suck up any sticks, it makes a horrifying noise. A little dusty, but hey, better than doing it by hand. Also, use a heavy extension cord, my 16 ga 50 footer got a little warm for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: After getting used to a 60V blower, it was an adjustment to have to drag a cord around.
customer_reviews.author: GKMiyake

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to, but it has some design flaws (imho)
customer_reviews.text: This blower/vac works and I would like to give it a higher rating but there are a few things that make it annoying to use. 1.It is very heavy and awkward to hold. 2.The plastic button/lock that attaches the bag to the vac output constantly slips so the bag will fall off and the leaves go shooting out of the contraption. 3. It is extremely loud. As I said, the product works well, but from my perspective there are some design flaws that make it a little frustrating to use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Not even Greenworks knows about this product
customer_reviews.text: Product is so new, Greenworks own website doesn't even have information on this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mike

customer_reviews.title: good price, works well, blows a lot of dust while vacuuming.
customer_reviews.text: good price, works well, blows a lot of dust while vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Very strong blower
customer_reviews.text: I like the Greenworks products. They are light weight, well made, and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: MS Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Used only one time it failed to turn on again!
customer_reviews.author: J R RIDD

customer_reviews.title: greenworks leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: good job blowing leaf off porch ,have not tried picking up leafs yet.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth jones jr

customer_reviews.title: Does what it states.
customer_reviews.text: Was strong and does what it says, the only fault is when you use the vacume mode, the multch process does shoot out through the porse bag and feel fine particles coming out and can be itchy
customer_reviews.author: dat

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bulky as expected. Impeller is not metal and I am wondering how long it will last with it picking up twigs and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: S. Young

customer_reviews.title: Started by blowing leaves out from around fence and trees and it worked great but when it came time to vac and bag
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one afternoon. Started by blowing leaves out from around fence and trees and it worked great but when it came time to vac and bag, we got about 3/4 done and it just stopped, like it had blown a fuse? But, no fuse that you can access and no reset button. Call manufacturer and they said send it back so we did. Glad we were mostly done with our fall chores! Wanted to like it but expect it to work more than once doing normal yard work.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Variable Speed
customer_reviews.text: So far it does the job. The variable speed is very helpful at cleaning leaves from a xeriscape area. It allows the vacuum to pick up leaves without picking up rocks.
customer_reviews.author: bp

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: At 230mph there isn't a leaf or any amount of dirt and dust that has a chance with this unit. Haven't tried the vacuum yet but I'm sure it will work fine when the leaves start falling.
customer_reviews.author: rjb77

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. It quit working after a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C

customer_reviews.title: Great blower!!!
customer_reviews.text: Blower works perfectly! I haven't used the mulcher attachments, and don't plan on ever really using them. I only bought this for the blowing, and it works great! The switch to turn it on is on a roller, so you can adjust the speed smoothly and as slow or fast as you want. The attachments are also nice. There is a narrow cap attachment for a more direct hit of air when needed. They could have charged a lot more money and it would have still been worth it! Great product! (I also have the "Greenworks" push lawn mower, and it's great too) "Greenworks" makes wonderfully affordable yet quality products.
customer_reviews.author: becki0922

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Greenworks lawn tool, and it works well. For anyone who needs to control the air flow, this is it, and for the small difference in price, it's well worth it. Case in point - we live in FL, and have several gardens which have shells instead of regular mulch. A normal blower throws the shells out into the lawn. This can be throttled down, and, along with using some common sense, it's possible to blow the junk out, without the shells.
customer_reviews.author: North Port Guy

customer_reviews.title: A can't go wrong purchase
customer_reviews.text: A light weight powerful unit that does more than expected
customer_reviews.author: roy paul shields

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and it will blow you away.
customer_reviews.text: Blower works fantastically well. I normally use it on the lower setting and find that's sufficient. I have an oak, three aspens, an elm and two lime trees to contend with, and they all seem to work against me by staging their leaf-losing skills. It's not heavy and is easy to operate. I have not tried the vacuum portion of this. The only con is that it comes with no extension cord and its cord is about 10cm or 4 inches long, so you cannot get by without one.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Little on the heavy side, no support of the weight,
customer_reviews.text: Blowing leaves one of the most powerful at over 200mph.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Martinez

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: replaced gas blower and was glad I did !!! A+++
customer_reviews.author: Richard McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Easily Breaks -- do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I used this blower on 3 separate occasions. The first, I moved around a few leaves for fun. The second, I mulched and blew leaves for about 45 mins. It did stop once, but after cooling off, it seemed fine. The third time, it ran for about 30 minutes and has not started since. I bought it too far away from leaf season; so, I am just out of luck. The shipping plus prorated return value costs as much as a new one. I would avoid this product!!
customer_reviews.author: JamesMcB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one I have purchased. Excellent warranty. Huge yard and I have worn out the first 2. Very strong blower and vac. Highly recommend..
customer_reviews.author: comfy shoes

customer_reviews.title: Greenworks Electric Blower/Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say we don't use the bag. It works perfect for what we need it for. My husband would have liked more MPH but it still gives out plenty for our yard. I think if you read all the reviews on this one you can figure out whether it's for you. It was easy to put the nose piece on. It was just what we needed for our yard. We get a lot of wind and this blows the dust off of our deck and all the leaves off of the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann & Ken

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Thank you greenworks. Ok, its only been one use so far but I am definitely happy. My last blower/mulcher (Toro) required constant adjustments to keep working. The metal blade on the greenworks mulcher is faaaaaaaar superior to the plastic one I am use to and this one does not require constant adjustments to keep the vac tube in just the right location so that the motor continued working. No more constant clearing out of the plastic blade....hurray! I will follow up with an updated review after I have finished the fall season (.5 acre heavily wooded lot)
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used one time, tried using again 2 months later, nothing........really, really disappointed. Would Not recommend this product to anyone. Cheaply made!!
customer_reviews.author: conrad wright

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: All i can say is wow. this works better then my old gas blower. and it's a lot lighter too. what used to take me an hour to do now takes 40 mins. i have to say this with all the products i have bought i have never had any as good, and well built as the greenworks line I have three of there products and all are superb. i also like the fact that they also carry a long warranty compared to anything else. i give this 5 stars just like every other greenworks item i have bought.
customer_reviews.author: DustyD13

customer_reviews.title: Light and powerful
customer_reviews.text: This blower is light and powerful. I have used it quite a few times now over the last month since I have a lot of trees on my property that shed leaves every day. I have never used it past 50% power since its more than powerful enough. Unfortunately I have not used the vacuum feature on it yet, so I will not be able to review that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Great blower, lots of power, variable speed.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle, love the variable speed. Takes care of anything need a blower for.
customer_reviews.author: GLynn

customer_reviews.title: Goes from suck to blow with ease
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the bad Spaceball movie reference this is a great product for your dollar. It has a solid build feel and is light enough to work with and handle well. All the attachments can also fit in the included collection bag for easy storage which is a nice plus. It is a fairly loud machine but I expect that is on par for all blowers like this. If used in confined spaces I would recommend ear protection.
customer_reviews.author: D. Oberholtzer

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have the power they claim, not very effective beyond 2 or 3 ft from nozzle,my torso was better
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P In

customer_reviews.title: Bag too porous
customer_reviews.text: The bag allows far too much material to pass through, covering the user with fine dust, need a shower after each use. Bought this unit because of great reviews, no one mentions the bag for leaf blowers, vacuums. This is my third combo blower, yes I'm an old dud, and have never had this problem. Going to toss this one.
customer_reviews.author: John Collins

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Not Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Really good product and really powerful. For personal use, it is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Bulent Dorttepe

customer_reviews.title: Great leaf handler
customer_reviews.text: Love this leaf blower/shredder. Works really well in mulching the leaves and the blower is really powerful.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vera

customer_reviews.title: great price.
customer_reviews.text: i use mine mostly for suction.it works good for leaves.
customer_reviews.author: arthur jones

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: it works for about 3 minutes then it has to cool down so it will start back up after 5 minutes in cold weather I’ll just keep it and remove the high temp switch that I assume is bad.... just got a bad one I guess
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: Great leaf vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great leaf vacuum. At first for the price I figured it would just be ok. But after using it I was more than impressed. It picked up every leaf after one sweep. Strong power, it’ll do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff and Kev

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Best outdoor purchase I’ve made in a long time. Resilient, powerful, convenient. Nothing like vacuuming up your leaves while others spend hours raking.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Lavan

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the vacuum function to pick up leaves on my porch. It seems to create a cloud of dust however when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - Ignore the Negative Nellys
customer_reviews.text: Good thing I ignored the few negative reviews. This Blower/Mulcher is great. I am pulling leaves off of woodchips and the variable speed is perfect, I can set it so it pulls up the leaves, but not the woodchips. One negative Nelly said it would not suck up wet leaves, probably true, but it did get old leaves in areas I have not raked in 3 seasons. The assembly was very easy and the blower is very powerful. Also it is a Mulcher, it will mulch the leaves so they do not take up much space in the bag (bag was very heavy duty and worked perfectly). Great Buy for $45
customer_reviews.author: Catharine J. Bening

customer_reviews.title: Product failure
customer_reviews.text: Used briefly. Turned off and product would not restart. I have returned item and contacted Amazon who is contacting Light Force. Awaiting Amazon credit to my account.
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Not a powerful and it claims
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a powerful as it says it is . Very disappointed. Will not be using this for my yard . Will be getting something much stronger
customer_reviews.author: francie abrahamson

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm ....powerful like it very much !!!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt B. Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: afraid to use it.
customer_reviews.text: It starts smoking after 10 minutes of use. Also, the speed of the motor goes to about half speed. I never complained before because I didn't open the package until I moved into our new home several months after the blower was purchased.
customer_reviews.author: showlowbobby

customer_reviews.title: Lite weight and lots of power
customer_reviews.text: We will not buy any other leave blower this is the best on the market. We have lots of trees and of course leaves this machine is a work horse.
customer_reviews.author: g force

customer_reviews.title: Blower works fine. The bag is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: The blower does a good job in both blowing and vacuuming. It's a tad smaller and lighter than my old Toro blower/vacuum. My main complaint is the quality of the bag. After a couple of years the bag actually disintegrated like cardboard. The only place you can purchase a replacement bag is at Greenworks - for $27.00. If you buy this blower, order 2 or 3 extra bags. That should last the life of the blower/vacuum. As for me, I'll stick with my old Toro. The bag is still in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kuhns

customer_reviews.title: This is a handy little workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assembly and easy to use. Deck boards needed to be power washed, and the Greenworks power washer worked as I needed it to do. It’s important to adjust the water pressure properly so any wood won’t splint.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy C.

customer_reviews.title: Blower
customer_reviews.text: Rated at 120 mph this babe hardly puts out 80 mph or less. Its not all that powerful but does do the job. The vacuuming really does not do all that good a job, but then I try to vacuum sycamore tree leaves. For maple leaves its a little better but still clogs up and have to pull leaves out from the chute. Hope that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kontiki

customer_reviews.title: Leaf Blower lacking power
customer_reviews.text: I had thought the Greenworks leaf blower would be more powerful. It has relatively small nozzle and unfortunately does not move the leafs as easily as I had thought It would
customer_reviews.author: Robert K Neely

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Blower function is fantastic- quiet and adequate for dry leaves at low speed, quieter than gas equivalent and great power at full speed. Light and easy to use. Mulcher function works quite well, although you really do want eye protection, gloves, and clothes ready to get dirty - it pumps out lots of dust and dirt while grinding.. But that's inherent to the way it works, not a product problem. Superb product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Stillson

customer_reviews.title: bad blower
customer_reviews.text: the leaf blower blew up the extension cord can't use it-Marney Hibbard would like to return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: surprized at how durable for the price, bought originally to shred blowin in insulation and push it through black drain tile into the attic, worked sweet, still using it to sweep the garage, drive, walks, and deck/patio and suck+bag the leaves around our foundation plantings, the variable speed really helps when cleaning the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Stover

customer_reviews.title: the vacumn is too easy to break
customer_reviews.text: I should read more reviews before I place the order, After the first time use for about half an hour, the vacumn bag break a hole and all dirt come out from there, the quality of the bag is very bad, all buyers should aware if this.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price! It’s not pro or anything
customer_reviews.text: It’s Koo for a small job. I had big piles of leaves so the mulcher had a hard time with grinding them up, they kept getting stuck so I had to stop it and pull them out of the tube manually. Learned it could only take in a bit at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gibson

product_meta.title: Greenworks 2 Speed 230 MPH Electric Leaf Blower/Vacuum 24022
product_meta.description:
Style:Corded| Size:230 MPH / 375 CFMGreenworks 12 Amp Blower Vacuum features a high impact mulching blade, 2-speed control, 230 MPH, 375 CFM, tool-less blower to vacuum conversion, cord lock, cushioned overmold grip, durable vacuum bag, and 4-year warranty

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The GreenWorks products that you purchase have a ZERO carbon footprint. We'll say that again - our entire product line will never release an ounce of carbon emission into the air. 4 Year Warranty - Double The Industry Standard. When looking for lawn tools, we know you're thinking about quality. You're looking for something that will get the job done and get you back to your weekend. That's why GreenWorks backs every tool with a full four-year warranty - we know our products will perform at the highest level and always be reliable. GreenWorks high quality products are manufactured to last. That's why we back every product with a warranty that's twice the industry standard. We'll provide all the power you need without polluting the air or forcing you to keep hauling your gas can to the nearest station (especially in the middle of a mow). No more tune-ups or maintenance. No more emissions. Fifty-four million Americans mow their lawns every weekend, according to the EPA, using 800 million gallons of gas each year. Along the way, homeowners spill more than 17 million gallons of gas while refueling. That's equivalent to the 1989 Exxon Valdez disaster. It's time to move beyond clumsy, harmful gas-powered mowers. It's time for GreenWorks to be your lawn tools for life.
feature_bullets: Designed to provide superior mulching and high powered performance
Powerful 12 amp motor generates 230 MPH / 375 CFM to clear debris, sticks, and leaves
2-speed control for better control in both blower and vacuum mode
Converts from blower to vacuum function with no tools required. Important: Use 14 gauge 50' or 12 gauge 100' extension cord
